title: Bankrupt Bitcoin Miner Core Scientific to Buy 27K Bitmain Servers for $77M
description: Bitcoin miner Core Scientific (CORZQ) has agreed to exchange $23.1 million in cash and $53.9 million in common stock for 27,000 Bitmain S19J XP 151 TH bitcoin mining servers, according to a press release.

title: Upland takes philanthropy to the metaverse: NFTs to support equitable playground access
